text: Elections to Epping Forest Council were held on 4 May 2000. One third of the council was up for election and the council stayed under no overall control. Overall turnout was 30.4%. After the election, the composition of the council was *Conservative 20 *Liberal Democrat 16 *Labour 12 *Residents 8 *Independent 3 ==Election result== 1 Conservative candidate was unopposed ==Ward results== ==References== *2000 Epping Forest election result *Ward results 2000 Category:2000 English local elections Category:2000s in Essex
title: 2000 Epping Forest District Council election
